text: The Junpai A50 () is a compact sedan produced by Junpai, a sub-brand of FAW Group. == History == 2018 FAW-Junpai A50, rear The vehicle was unveiled at Auto Shanghai in April 2017 and is being sold exclusively in China since April 2018. The SUV Junpai CX65 uses the same platform. == References == A50 Category:Front-wheel-drive vehicles Category:Compact cars Category:Sedans Category:2010s cars Category:Cars introduced in 2018
title: Junpai A50
